author: peter-bertok
body:
Add-Computer should have the -NewName parameter removed. 

**It. Just. Does. Not. Work.** It has never worked. It will never work. The underlying API is too buggy too use, and has been since Windows 2000.

Just because it works *occasionally* doesn't mean it should be included. It's a landmine that *will* fail for practically everybody in just about any circumstance.

A feature that is this critical should not be left in if it has a > 50% failure rate even in greenfields environments with the latest Windows Server 2019 or Windows 10 buidls.

Just take it out.

Please.

- Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/known-issues-ps6?view=powershell-6).
